Our Accomodation

The resort has a total of 31 hotel suites located over two floors. Our hotel suites are all studio style, sleeping up to 3 guests. Featuring Free In-Room WiFi, Tea and Coffee making facilities, bar fridge, en suite bathrooms most of which with baths, flat screen TVs with Blockbuster movies, and some feature Balcony’s. The Hotel Suites are Fully Serviced Daily.

  • Hotel
  • Self Contained Family Chalets
  • Villas
Learn More

Hotel

The Swiss Village at Grindelwald is a wonderful location for a day visit on your next trip to Launceston and the Tamar Valley. The village is set in the grounds of Tamar Valley Resort.

Our Accomodation

The resort has a total of 31 hotel suites located over two floors. Our hotel suites are all studio style, sleeping up to 3 guests. Featuring Free In-Room WiFi, Tea and Coffee making facilities, bar fridge, en suite bathrooms most of which with baths, flat screen TVs with Blockbuster movies, and some feature Balcony’s. The Hotel Suites are Fully Serviced Daily.

Alpenrose Bistro and Bar

Dining

Dine in the iconic Swiss Lodge Style Bistro whilst overlooking the beautiful Lake Serine and enjoy the very best of our Tasmanian fare!

Hot Deals

Join our Wicked Wednesday email subscription where you will receive weekly treats exclusive only to our Wicket Wednesday subscribers

View Deals

Set on over 150 magnificent acres amid numerous spectacular lakes with breathtaking views, the resort boasts World Class facilities in arguably Tasmania's most exclusive and exotic suburb. Aspect Tamar Valley Resort is perfectly located 15 minutes drive north of Launceston, and is ideally positioned to use as a base whilst exploring all that Northern Tasmania has to offer.
